nodes.text: We Will Beat Them Again was a propaganda poster by the Resistance. It depicted two X-wing starfighters chasing TIE fighters, with each X-Wing and TIE resembling a Rebel and Resistance version, and an Empire and First Order version, respectively, as well as the text "We Beat Them Before, We Will Beat Them Again!".

This poster is based on a real British anti-German propaganda poster created during World War II, which depicts German soldiers surrendering to the Allied forces. The original caption reads: We beat 'em before..We'll beat 'em again!"
